name: The Dead Castle
description:
Max just woke up from a long sleep. He woke up in a castle. Now he needs to escape from the castle. While he is escaping he will meet many levels. Many easy and many hard levels. The goal is to complete all the level and come out of the castle and the hole place.

DEMO OUT 25.12.2016!

FULL VERSION IS UNKNOWN.

VERSIONS:

DEMO 0.0.10:

- 3 LEVELS

- MAIN MENU

- INTRO

In the full version it's gets a own coded launcher. Then you only need to download the launcher and launch the game.
